ingredients: 1 large ripe avocado, halved and pitted
1 fresh jalapeno pepper - seeded, deveined, and minced, or to taste
recipe: Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add nopales and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 10 minutes. Let cool.
Mash avocado in a bowl with lime juice, olive oil, and salt. Stir in tomato, jalapeno, cilantro, and cooked nopales.
